item.title: Why police baby killers are still not on trial seven years on
item.description: Seven years after Samantha Pendo's death her parents are still waiting for the trial of officers to begin.

item.title: Acting legend Dame Joan Plowright dies at 95
item.description: She was one of Britain's most acclaimed stage and screen stars and the widow of Sir Laurence Olivier.

item.title: Drone footage shows fire at one of world's largest battery plants
item.description: The Moss Landing power plant, in California, was evacuated, as were people in the surrounding area.

item.title: Who is China sending to Trump's inauguration?
item.description: This is the first time a senior Chinese leader will witness a US president being sworn in.

item.title: Russia jails lawyers who acted for late opposition leader Alexei Navalny
item.description: The trio were arrested as authorities intensified pressure on the jailed Kremlin critic, who died last February.
